Translations.Text: El gxi ni kre vi gxi ni return vi el gxi ni bring vi out re
Ni montr him all our proofs li disbelieved rifuz
Li dir vi ven here sorb us our land your magic O Moses
Ni surely montr vi simil magic Do set appointment ke nek ni nor vi violate; neuxtral met
Li dir Your appointed temp est tag festivities. all meet forenoon
Pharaoh summoned his forces tiam ven
Moses dir al them Ve al vi. Vi fabricate mensog batal DI Do do incur His retribution? Such fabricators surely fail
Ili disput themselves as ili conferred privately
Ili dir These 2 est ne plur than magicians wish sorb vi your land their magic al detru your ideal voj da life
agree upon 1 scheme vizagx them united front! winner hodiaux hav upper man
Ili dir O Moses either vi jxet ni est 1 jxet
Li dir Vi jxet. Whereupon their sxnur baston aper him their magic as ili mov
Moses harbored kelk tim
Ni dir ne Hav tim! Vi prevail
Jxet ki vi ten en your dekstr man gxi hirund ki ili fabricated ki ili fabricated est ne plur than scheming magician. magician's work ne sukces
magicians fal prostrate dir Ni kred en Lord de Aaron Moses

Li dir Did vi kred en him my permission? Li est your cxef; unu instru vi magic Mi surely sever your man fut altern flank. Mi crucify vi palm trunk. Vi do gxi trov out which de us inflict mav retribution who outlasts whom
Ili dir Ni ne prefer vi klar proofs ke ven us kaj Unu kre us! Do issue whatever judgment vi wish issue Vi nur regul en this lowly life
Ni hav kred en our Lord ti Li forgive us our pek magic ke vi forced us perform DI est far PUT Everlasting
Anyone ven his Lord kulp vol incur Infer wherein li neniam mort nor rest alive
As por those ven Him believers plumb righteous life ili ating alt rang
Gxarden Eden beneath which river flu est their abode forever Such est rekompenc those purify
Ni inspir Moses Plumb My servants out strik them sek road mar. Vi ne tim vi kapt nor shall vi worry
Pharaoh pursued them kun his trup mar overwhelmed them as gxi est destin overwhelm them
Tiel Pharaoh misled his popol; li ne direkt them
O Infan Israel ni liver vi your enemy summoned vi Mount Sinai ni send down al vi manna quails
Mangx bon ajx ni proviz por vi ne transgress lest vi incur My wrath. Whoever incurs My wrath fal
Mi surely Forgiving those pent kred plumb righteous life steadfastly ceter direkt
